Snacks

Samosa ₹105.00

Fried pastry with a savoury filling, including ingredients such as spiced potatoes, onions, peas, meat or fish.

Finely sliced banana smothered in a simple, fragrantly spiced batter and fried to crispy perfection.

Finely sliced onion smothered in a simple, fragrantly spiced batter and fried to crispy perfection.

French Fries are deep oil fried potato slices.

Panipuri is deep-fried breaded sphere filled with potato, onion, or chickpea.

Masala Puri ₹119.00

Crushed puris are soaked in hot masala gravy made up of puffed rice, green peas, chili powder, garam masala, chaat masala, coriander powder, etc.
